name: Dental Checkup
description: Routine examination to assess the overall health of your teeth and gums.

name: Teeth Cleaning
description: Professional cleaning to remove plaque, tartar, and surface stains.

name: Tooth Extraction
description: Safe removal of damaged or problematic teeth.

name: Dental Fillings
description: Repairs cavities or cracked teeth with tooth-colored materials.

name: Root Canal Treatment
description: Removes infected pulp and preserves your natural tooth.

name: Dental Crowns
description: Covers and restores damaged teeth for improved function and appearance.

name: Dental Bridge
description: Replaces one or more missing teeth using a fixed dental bridge.

name: Dental Implants
description: Permanent replacement for missing teeth with titanium implants.

name: Dentures
description: Removable replacements for missing teeth to restore function and smile.

name: Orthodontic Braces
description: Straightens teeth and corrects bite alignment using brackets and wires.

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Brightens and whitens teeth for a confident smile.

name: Veneers
description: Thin porcelain shells applied to teeth for aesthetic enhancement.

name: Scaling and Root Planing
description: Deep cleaning below the gum line to treat gum disease.

name: Dental Sealants
description: Protective coating applied to children’s molars to prevent decay.
